s: ^Sorry to interupt, Jon mentioned you could tell me more about the Town?

g-1: ^Of course he did.. my name's Brom, don't bother telling me yours, don't really care for a passing bards name.
^I'm one of the town guards, so don't go around causing trouble, 'cause then I'll have to take care of it. Gods know my brother won't...

Family: ^Ugh... he's the towns other guard. He's on patrol right now. Now go away, I'd like to get back to enjoying my ale without thinking about his stupid face.
Work: ^My work's pretty simple, folks 'round here aren't stupid enough to stay out after dark, and the town isn't big enough to warrant any attention from bandits and the like. Hell, even the Mage guild doesn't bother looking for recruits here anymore.
^It's a pretty easy job, but recently I've lost my keys somewhere 'round here and it makes getting in and out of the Guardhouse difficult... don't tell my brother. Need anything else?
